name: Eldarune: Tides of Existence
description:
Tides of Existence is an action game in a medieval setup. The player can use weapons, skills, dragons, and warships to defeat enemies and all kinds of creatures. As the player proceeds through the story, new challenges have to be handled and many mysteries have to be illuminated.

Tides of Existence innovates in a number of key areas:

Game Design: Tides of Existence gives the player many options to defeat the enemy. Swords, crossbows, shields, magic, and dragons can be used to defeat enemies.

Visuals: Eldarune: Tides of Existence is playable 4k HDR on capable devices. Also highly performant compared to the quality.

Rich Gameplay Mechanics: Thanks to various mechanics, players will have maximum joy. The player can use swords to cut enemies in half, crossbows to pin enemies down, and call a dragon to burn them all. Moreover, players can sail to wreck enemy ships using powerful arbalests installed on the deck, control a dragon to destroy a huge fleet, or hunt down other dragons in the air.

Story: Tides of Existence’s mysterious medieval - science fiction story. During the game, many questions will be answered and many more are asked to be answered in the future.
